'''''The Hobbit Birthday Book''''' is a blank diary featuring illustrations by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] from ''[[The Hobbit]]'' (coloured by [[H.E. Riddett]]). It was published to celebrate the centenary of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] ([[1892]]-[[1992]]).
==See also==
*''[[The Tolkien Address Book]]''
